creator: remm@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 22199
Patch

NSIS is fully usable through Wine. The attached patch should add support for building the Windows installer on Unix.

Created attachment 22200
Improved patch

Improved patch (download NSIS zip during download, fix properties).
creator: remm@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text: Remy applied this to 6.0.x and it is included in 6.0.17 onwards.
